body_html: The example at the TF Dev Summit was gRPC on AWS p2.8xLarge systems. We did that on purpose to ensure it was "commodity" hardware everyone can use. Most of use took time off after the summit. While not something I should promise, I will commit to updating this thread once a week until we have all of the code published. The updates might be boring. Feel free to ping me if I forget.

Most of use took time off after the summit.  While not something I should promise, I will commit to updating this thread once a week until we have all of the code published.
